name: WTA Tour Tennis
description:
Back of Case - XBOX (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Play with The Pros!

(screenshot captions)

Serve up action with up to 4 players

Challenge the pros including Serena Williams, Martina Hingis and Jelena Dokic

Lifelike graphics with intuitive controls

Track your success with statistics on all aspects of your game

10 locations around the world

3 court surfaces affecting ball dynamics
developedBy: Konami Computer Entertainment Osaka Co., Ltd.
